name: uniswap-v3-fork-push-chain
description: Uniswap V3 fork for Push Chain deployment

scripts.deploy-core: cd v3-core && npm install && npx hardhat compile && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy-core.js --network pushchain
scripts.deploy-periphery: cd v3-periphery && npm install && npx hardhat compile && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy-periphery.js --network pushchain
scripts.deploy-all: npm run deploy-core && npm run deploy-periphery
scripts.clean: cd v3-core && npx hardhat clean && cd ../v3-periphery && npx hardhat clean
